attributes.action: call a General Election and let the people decide whether his Government is 'fit for purpose'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Government is lurching from crisis to crisis presided over by a Prime Minister Without Mandate.  In view of significant challenges that lie ahead and his first duty, to protect the citizens, he must gain their approval to lead or make way.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
